node.title: Species diversity of the invasice Callery pear, Pyrus calleryana (part 1)
node.summary: Our paper on species diversity of Callery pear (invasive in US) to be published in MDPI Life.

node.title: Evolutionary history of Peronospora tabacina, tobacco downy mildew
node.summary: Our paper on diversity and history of Peronospora tabacina published in APS Phytopathology.

node.title: Microsatellites of Viburnum farreri
node.summary: Our paper on SSRs in fragrant virunum published in MDPI Plants.

node.title: Species diversity of Asian dogwood, Cornus kousa
node.summary: Our paper on Asian dogwood species diversity published in Ecology and Evolution.

node.title: In vitro propagation of an endangered Helianthus verticillatus by axillary bud proliferation
node.summary: Simple tissue culture protocol for clonal multiplication of an endangered sunflower.

node.title: Influence of SDHI seed treatment on the physiological conditions of spring barley seedlings under drought stress
node.summary: Collaborative paper with Poznan University of Life Sciences (Poland).

node.title: The effect of habitat fragmentation on genetic diversity and differentiation; fine-scale population structure of Cercis canadensis (Eastern Redbud)
node.summary: Fine-scale genetic diversity study of Eastern redbud indicates two distinct genetic clusters in the Southern Appalachia.

node.title: Road trips for redbuds; An assessment of the genetic diversity and spatial distribution of Cercis canadensis in the US
node.summary: Genetic diversity study of Eastern redbud indicates two distinct genetic clusters across the species native range in the US.
